statements: UPDATE security_camera_footage SET location='Entrance', event_type='Motion Detected' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET event_type='Vehicle Passed', duration=120, location='Parking Lot' WHERE camera_id=2;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET event_type = 'Motion Detected', duration = 30 WHERE id = 100
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', location = 'Front Entrance' WHERE id = 200
UPDATE security_camera_metadata SET recording_start = '2021-10-01 08:00:00' WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE search_history SET search_timestamp = '2021-10-05 10:00:00', camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE search_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4g7h-8i9j-0k1l2m3n4o5p';
UPDATE security_camera_metadata SET recording_end = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE search_history SET search_timestamp = NOW(), camera_id = '456e89b-e12d3-123a-4266-14174000' WHERE search_id = '890b12d3-4567-e89b-123a-4266-14174000';
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage_path = '/path/to/new/footage.mp4' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE security_camera_log SET user_id = 10, action_type = 'viewed' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage_path = '/path/to/new/footage1.mov' WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE security_camera_log SET action_type = 'viewed', timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET location = 'Entrance', footage_url = 'http://example.com/entrance_footage.mp4' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE camera_status SET last_checked = '2023-01-15 09:30:00', status = 'Active' WHERE camera_id = 2;
UPDATE security_camera_footage SET footage_url = 'http://example.com/footage1.mp4' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE camera_alerts SET alert_type = 'Motion Detection', details = 'Suspicious activity detected' WHERE camera_id = 2
UPDATE SecurityCameraFootageMetadata SET duration = 120 WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE CameraLocation SET location_description = 'Main Entrance' WHERE camera_id = 2;
UPDATE SecurityCameraFootageMetadata SET location = 'Entrance', duration = 300 WHERE camera_id = 1;
UPDATE UserAccessPermissions SET permission_level = 'admin' WHERE user_id = 101 AND camera_id = 2;
